review.title: “A demanding job but i was motivated to do my best,”
review.pros: Pros – An exciting place to work; the Operations and Engineering teams are top notch; fun stuff working with 3D technology! Good pay, good benefits; upper management wants RealD to be a top 100 best companies to work for in the US. Very lofty goal indeed but the could make it happen.
review.cons: Cons – Each employee needs to take control of their work/life balance, cuz the company wont do that for you. I made that mistake.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Be more forthcoming with your plans with layoffs. It will help those impacted to be better prepared if/when that event DOES take place.
